name: Motorola Signature
highlights:
Not announced yet
186g, 7mm thickness
Android 16, up to 7 major Android upgrades
256GB/512GB/1TB storage, no card slot

BODY.Build: Glass front (Gorilla Glass Victus 2), aluminum frame
BODY.SIM: Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM + eSIM (max 2 at a time)
BODY:
IP68/IP69 dust tight and water resistant (high pressure water jets; immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)
MIL-STD-810H compliant*
* does not guarantee ruggedness or use in extreme conditions

DISPLAY.Type: LTPO AMOLED, 1B colors, 165Hz, Dolby Vision, HDR10+, 6200 nits (peak)

PLATFORM.OS: Android 16, up to 7 major Android upgrades
PLATFORM.CPU: Octa-core (2x3.8 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix L + 6x3.32 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix M)

MAIN CAMERA.Triple:
50 MP, f/1.6, 23mm (wide), 1/1.28", 1.22µm, multi-directional PDAF, OIS
50 MP, 71mm (periscope telephoto), 1/1.95", 0.8µm, dual-pixel PDAF, OIS, 3x optical zoom
50 MP, f/2.0, 12mm, 122˚ (ultrawide), 1/2.76", 0.64µm, PDAF
MAIN CAMERA.Features: Laser AF, Dual-LED flash, HDR, panorama

SOUND.Loudspeaker: Yes, with stereo speakers (with Dolby Atmos)
SOUND:
24-bit/192kHz Hi-Res & Hi-Res Wireless audio
Sound by Bose; Qualcomm Snapdragon Sound

FEATURES.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass
FEATURES:
Smart Connect (Ready For) support
Ultra Wideband (UWB) support

BATTERY.Charging:
90W wired
50W wireless
10W reverse wireless
5W reverse wired
